医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的 EULAR 调查：邀请欧洲各地的患者分享 RMD 经验EULAR 的新调查旨在收集欧洲各地患者对风湿病和肌肉骨骼疾病 (RMD) 影响的宝贵见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-EULAR-survey-Patients-across-Europe-in​​vited-to-share-RMD-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-EULAR-survey-Patients-across-Europe-in​​vited-to-share-RMD-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c95b9ea-9375-4ff0-ae39-824a3c4df140 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:26:00 -0400 New EULAR survey: Patients across Europe invited to share RMD experiences
EULAR 支持使用 RECLARIT 进行炎症性关节炎的自我管理EULAR - 欧洲风湿病协会联盟 - 建议炎症性关节炎患者进行自我管理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/EULAR-endorses-self-management-of-炎症-关节炎-with-RECLARIT.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/EULAR-endorses-self-management-of-炎症-关节炎-with-RECLARIT.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57b3ef24-a86c-4ace-bcda-802e0f092111 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:19:00 -0400 EULAR endorses self-management of inflammatory arthritis with RECLARIT
EULAR 公布雄心勃勃的 2024-2029 年抗击风湿病欧洲宣言欧洲风湿病协会联盟 (EULAR) 自豪地宣布推出 2024 - 2029 年欧洲宣言，旨在解决欧洲协调应对风湿病和肌肉骨骼疾病 (RMD) 的迫切需要，特别关注以下领域：护理、研究和社会政策的质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/EULAR-unveils-ambitious-2024-2029-European-Manifesto-to-combat-rheumatic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/EULAR-unveils-ambitious-2024-2029-European-Manifesto-to-combat-rheumatic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e6ef53f-e18d-4908-9743-183d58e94c1b Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:11:00 -0400 EULAR unveils ambitious 2024-2029 European Manifesto to combat rheumatic diseases
EULAR 启动 ENTRI 计划以促进整个欧洲的风湿病研究欧洲风湿病协会联盟 (EULAR) 自豪地宣布启动 EULAR 试验中心网络 (ENTRI) 计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/EULAR-launches-ENTRI-initiative-to-boost-rheumatic-disease-research-across-Europe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/EULAR-launches-ENTRI-initiative-to-boost-rheumatic-disease-research-across-Europe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95e50d67-9b05-47ac-b5d3-d3207fff2f49 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 10:03:00 -0400 EULAR launches ENTRI initiative to boost rheumatic disease research across Europe
血液干扰素特征揭示了儿科发病的干燥病的关键差异由于临床表现的差异和知识有限，诊断儿童干燥病可能具有挑战性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Blood-interferon-signature-reveals-key-differences-in-pediatric-onset-Sjogrens-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Blood-interferon-signature-reveals-key-differences-in-pediatric-onset-Sjogrens-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01d3267f-e377-461f-ae5d-960ee097df3f Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:52:00 -0400 Blood interferon signature reveals key differences in pediatric-onset Sjögren's disease
儿童期 SLE 器官损伤预测因素的新见解儿童期发病的系统性红斑狼疮 (cSLE) 是一种慢性、严重的自身免疫性疾病，有早期器官损伤的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-insights-into-predictors-of-organ-damage-in-childhood-onset-SLE.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-insights-into-predictors-of-organ-damage-in-childhood-onset-SLE.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f23ea91-53de-444d-8f80-360f9df30d14 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:44:00 -0400 New insights into predictors of organ damage in childhood-onset SLE
应对儿童关节炎向成人护理过渡的挑战风湿病会影响儿童时期的人们，最常见的是幼年特发性关节炎 (JIA)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Tackling-challenges-in-childhood-arthritis-transition-to-adult-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Tackling-challenges-in-childhood-arthritis-transition-to-adult-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54ad8de9-af20-43f5-82bc-c8f78057c25b Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:33:00 -0400 Tackling challenges in childhood arthritis transition to adult care
彻底改变生命科学：就 ASMS、SCIEX 7500+ 系统和 AI 驱动定量对 SCIEX 进行采访在我们最新的采访中，News Medical 与生命科学分析技术领域的全球领导者 SCIEX 进行了对话，了解他们在 ASMS 上发布的令人兴奋的 SCIEX 7500+ 系统，以及他们如何利用 AI 定量软件来简化解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Revolutionizing-Life-Science-An-Interview-with-SCIEX-on-ASMS-the-SCIEX-75002b-System-and-AI-Driven-Quantitation。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Revolutionizing-Life-Science-An-Interview-with-SCIEX-on-ASMS-the-SCIEX-75002b-System-and-AI-Driven-Quantitation。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60541774-43cc-4e62-988a-fc213d55c319 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:27:00 -0400 Revolutionizing Life Science: An Interview with SCIEX on ASMS, the SCIEX 7500+ System, and AI-Driven Quantitation
探索与骨关节炎相关的合并症骨关节炎是全世界最常见的关节炎，全球残疾和医疗保健利用的负担日益增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Exploring-the-comorbidities-linked-with-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Exploring-the-comorbidities-linked-with-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51d6d908-72c7-4c21-b0db-3a203ee88bcf Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:24:00 -0400 Exploring the comorbidities associated with osteoarthritis
基于人工智能的液体活检技术有望及早发现癌症复发威尔康奈尔医学院、纽约长老会医院、纽约基因组中心 (NYGC) 和纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项研究显示，一种基于人工智能的检测血液中肿瘤 DNA 的方法在预测癌症复发方面表现出了前所未有的敏感性（MSK）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/AI-based-liquid-biopsy-technology-promises-early-detection-of-cancer-recurrence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/AI-based-liquid-biopsy-technology-promises-early-detection-of-cancer-recurrence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05762e2d-ea99-4934-9eec-6173e5d594b5 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:15:04 -0400 AI-based liquid biopsy technology promises early detection of cancer recurrence
